humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, the sentinel lymph node from the right axilla was assessed and found to be negative for metastatic carcinoma (0/1). Based on the new rules 10 and 11, N0 indicates no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes or that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states 'Lymph node status: Negative 0/1' under the synoptic report for the wide local excision of the right breast. This indicates that there is no metastatic carcinoma found in the sentinel lymph node. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.
